resources.string: Did you find an EPUB file on your phone / tablet and wonder what program should open it \? Maybe someone emailed you an EPUB file but you\'re not sure how to use it.

A file with the EPUB file extension is an Open Publication Structure eBook file. The Open Publication Structure eBook format is a popular and freely available eBook standard so most EPUB files you find will probably be of this format.
How to Open an EPUB File?
The easiest way to open an EPUB file is to tap on “CHOOSE FILE” button, then simply select your epub file which located on your phone / tablet
